summary:
##  Fixes, UX Polish & Registry Optimizer Expansion

###  Script & Repair Fixes
- Fixed Shell/UI reset failure by defining `Stop-TidyAppxProcesses` **before** re-registration attempts
- No other Shell/UI changes

###  Threat Watch
- “Scan file” now short-circuits when busy
- Shows immediate **Running Defender file scan…** feedback
- Logs outcome and surfaces Defender verdict per click

###  Registry Optimizer UX
- Quick Actions card moved directly under the hero block (always visible on all screen sizes)
- Layout collapsed to a **single effective column** (no phantom side spacing)
- Removed telemetry sharing card from Settings
- Elevation section refreshed with clearer admin badges, copy, and feature notes
- Updated elevation strings to clearly state admin requirement and restart guidance

###  Installer & Bootstrap Stability
- Installer now **forces wizard window to close** on completion (fixes invisible “Setup” in Alt-Tab)
- App relaunch still uses shell exec without blocking the installer
- Fixed crash caused by WPF writing to a read-only PowerShell command property by switching binding to **OneWay**

###  PulseGuard Improvements
- Added focused **PulseGuardHeuristics** helper to detect real PowerShell 7 issues and suppress noise
- Expanded pending-automation dialog:
  - “Wait and close” vs “Wait (stay open)”
  - Clearer copy and distinct behaviors
- Added tests covering PS7 detection, false-positive suppression, and navigation noise

###  Reset Rescue / Registry Restore
- Fixed HKCU registry restore to correctly read `JsonElement` values (including base64 binary)
- Registry round-trip now succeeds reliably

---

##  Registry Optimizer -> New Tweaks Added (17)

- Added multiple new performance, gaming, and privacy tweaks (TCP latency, input responsiveness, memory behavior, GPU scheduling, task priority, UI/UX, privacy, networking, gaming)
- Examples include:
  - TCP latency reduction (Nagle/ACK)
  - Disable paging executive
  - GPU hardware scheduling
  - Foreground CPU priority boost
  - Game task scheduling priorities
  - Input latency and system feature toggles

###  Optimizer Safety & Tests
- Injected RAM provider into preflight for deterministic low-memory gating
- Added tests for:
  - Disable-paging-executive safety
  - Low-RAM block behavior
  - Per-preset completeness
  - Enable/disable support for every tweak
  - Gaming preset producing full operation plans
